sentence.Network_en: He was fatally driven to exaggerate his discontentment.
sentence.Network_cn: 这使他的不快无限膨胀.

sentence.Network_en: Content makes poor men rich; discontentment makes rich men poor.
sentence.Network_cn: 知足使穷人富有, 不满使富人贫穷.

sentence.Network_en: Responses from these major powers were clearly full of indignation and discontentment.
sentence.Network_cn: 从该几大国的反应来看,明显充满了愤怒和不满.
